isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - CYLINDER HEAD INSPECTION - CHECK FOR VALVE LEAKAGE (Using Mineral Spirits)

svcproc.title: CHECK FOR VALVE LEAKAGE (Using Mineral Spirits)
svcproc.para: Visually inspect for valve leakage as follows:

step1.para: Position the cylinder head on wood blocks with the gasket surface facing down.

Squirt mineral spirits into the intake and exhaust ports as shown in Figure 4.20
.

Wait five minutes, use an inspection mirror and visually inspect the valve seat area for leakage of the mineral spirits. Refer to Figure 4.21
. Repeat and check all intake and exhaust valves.

note.para: THERE SHOULD BE NO LEAKAGE. RECONDITIONING IS NOT REQUIRED IF THE CYLINDER HEAD PASSES THE MINERAL SPIRITS TEST. IF LEAKAGE IS OBSERVED, THE VALVES REQUIRE RECONDITIONING. REFER TO "CYLINDER HEAD RECONDITIONING" IN THIS SECTION.
